summary: Lehman Brothers was a big American bank started in 1850. It was the fourth largest investment bank in the U.S. before it went bankrupt in 2008. The bank had problems because of bad loans and lost most of its clients. This was the biggest bankruptcy in U.S. history and helped cause a global financial crisis. After Lehman Brothers failed, other banks like Barclays and Nomura bought some of its parts.
title: Lehman Brothers
